GSD.description:
md-raid10: fix KASAN warning

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.137 by commit 5fd4ffa2372a41361d2bdd27ea5730e4e673240c. For more details please see the references link.
